org.elkoserver.server.context.test

Class EchoMod

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elkoserver.server.context.Mod
      • org.elkoserver.server.context.test.EchoMod
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, DispatchTarget, Encodable, ContextMod, ObjectCompletionWatcher

    public class EchoMod
extends Mod
implements ContextMod, ObjectCompletionWatcher
    Mod to enable a context user to exercise the external 'echo' service.

      • echo

        @JSONMethod(value="text")
public void echo(User from,
                        String text)
          throws MessageHandlerException
        Message handler for the 'echo' message. This invokes the external echo service, if possible.
        Throws:
        MessageHandlerException

      • status

        @JSONMethod
public void status(User from)
            throws MessageHandlerException
        Message handler for the 'status' message. This requests a report on the state of the echo client connection.
        Throws:
        MessageHandlerException

      • objectIsComplete

        public void objectIsComplete()
        Take notice that the associated context is complete. In this case, we lookup the echo client object from the environment, now that (since the context is complete) there is an environment to look it up from.
        Specified by:
        objectIsComplete in interface ObjectCompletionWatcher
